column.name: service_instance_id
column.remarks: The identifier to the ETL-service instance where the ETL-phase was started/finished.

column.name: scheduled_at
column.remarks: The date-time when the execution was initially sent to the ETL-service.

column.name: phase_started_at
column.remarks: The date-time when the ETL-phase was started by the ETL-service.

column.name: phase_finished_at
column.remarks: The date-time when the ETL-phase was finished by the ETL-service.

column.name: total_processed_messages
column.remarks: Total successfully processed messages in the ETL-phase.

column.name: total_failed_messages
column.remarks: Total failed messages in the ETL-phase.

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: The datetime when the row was created.

column.name: updated_at
column.remarks: The datetime when the row was last time updated.
